TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult Func<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7,in T8,in T9,in T10,in T11,in T12,in T13,in T14,in T15,out TResult>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8, T9 arg9, T10 arg10, T11 arg11, T12 arg12, T13 arg13, T14 arg14, T15 arg15);
.class public auto ansi sealed Func`16<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8, - T9, - T10, - T11, - T12, - T13, - T14, - T15, + TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function Func(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8, In T9, In T10, In T11, In T12, In T13, In T14, In T15, Out TResult)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8, arg9 As T9, arg10 As T10, arg11 As T11, arg12 As T12, arg13 As T13, arg14 As T14, arg15 As T15) As TResult

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename T9, typename T10, typename T11, typename T12, typename T13, typename T14, typename T15, typename TResult> public delegate TResult Func(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8, T9 arg9, T10 arg10, T11 arg11, T12 arg12, T13 arg13, T14 arg14, T15 arg15);

summary.span: 封裝具有 15 個參數的方法，並傳回由 參數指定之類型的值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has 15 parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the parameter.

returns.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的傳回值。

span.span: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此委派来表示的方法，可以當做參數傳遞，而不必明確宣告自訂委派。You can use this delegate to represent a method that can be passed as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有 15 個參數，其中每一個都依值傳遞給它，而且它必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have 15 parameters, each of which is passed to it by value, and that it must return a value. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考的方法具有 15 個參數並傳回`void`(或在 Visual Basic 中宣告為`Sub`而`Function`)，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has 15 parameters and returns `void` (or in Visual Basic, that is declared as a `Sub` rather than as a `Function`), use the generic delegate instead. 您也可以使用委派匿名方法與 lambda 運算式。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions. Lambda 運算式的基礎類型是泛型的其中一個`Func`委派。The underlying type of a lambda expression is one of the generic `Func` delegates. 這可讓您能夠將 lambda 運算式當做參數傳遞而不明確地將它指派給委派。This makes it possible to pass a lambda expression as a parameter without explicitly assigning it to a delegate.
